title: Personal Artworks of RoadFires
content:
[[include theme:basalt darkmode=a|acsanimation=a|darksidebar=a|acsanimation=a]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
+ Wellcome to my personal Artworks 
------
[[size 80%]]
//Maybe someday I will draw something and post it here. Time has passed and I never thought to draw again, but perhaps now it's the time to draw again.//
[[/size]]

> Just in case, the username that I was use to draw in Deviant-Art (or other digital artwork) its [https://www.deviantart.com/libios Libios] (Way back after after I changed to RoadFires). //Maybe someday I will post some artworks in the future!//

++ SCP & SCP-ES Artworks

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-049" hide="- OMG, you unlock another one of the ten thousands fanarts of this SCP ö"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/de69vky-073a6c47-ed64-402e-9caf-0b43113276d8.png/v1/fill/w_1080,h_720,q_80,strp/scp___049_by_libios_de69vky-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..nnKQiZHAeYTIc1IYp3CHd-Ec2rT5yR5FQOaiBQxlDm8]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Gabriel Jade]] author of [[[SCP-049]]]** 
//First digital art working for SCP back in 2020// 
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2041" hide="- This SCP really have a big thinking about life. Its very terrify"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dgwxovr-904bb91c-8c9c-4a2a-8068-4cea28f89e14.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_2041_merrygoview_by_libios_dgwxovr-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..c7N5fFeosqO-zrRhynPQn86IN4ZKnNWGEMy7_3zTE8M]]
[[=]]
**[[*user trennerdios]] author of [[[SCP-2041]]]**
When the Red figure show up in a merry-go-round, you know that [DATA EXPUNGED]
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1730" hide="- The One who love doing grafitis in the walls!"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dgx0nah-b724922e-32e7-4771-a271-d572870730b5.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_1730_what_happened_to_the_site_13__by_libios_dgx0nah-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..w9CFX8tKNur3vA7Tcdc9C0Y6uJgYZj9ObhOgBJ6aE60]]
[[=]]
**[[*user djkaktus]] author of [[[SCP-1730]]]:** //What Happened to the Site-13?//
Visual fanart to "The Writer of the Walls". 
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4018" hide="- The Eye will give a good perpective of your own life, and the view of the world!"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dgxmcah-31e616ce-483c-4d3d-8eac-48a23c022dd1.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_4018_eye_by_libios_dgxmcah-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ExONMoOY1q9KGa5J4LxTzrED1KoqVtboJuyOoioqHcc]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Communism will win]] author of [[[SCP-4018]]]:**
//"Take a good look at your future."//
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1678" hide="- The city under a City, Unlondon-"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dhlm2lp-3d3c4e8b-2e56-4f66-beb6-1c81d6c78a90.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_1678_unlondon_by_libios_dhlm2lp-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..PNEy621XA0bQ2pD211ogwh0DjGVOHeYLo1lmO93J4to]]
[[=]]
**[[*user AstronautJoe]] author of [[[SCP-1678]]]: //UnLondon//**
//"SCP-1678-A"//
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]
------
[[collapsible show="+ SCP-ES-035" hide="- A huge automatan Knight! I love the story of this SCP!"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dgx51l9-36830db8-8de0-4126-a213-b07a4c34963e.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_es_035__directriz_de_guardian_by_libios_dgx51l9-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Rpzsnft9An_D82el9Ddv04RbEp360n8-0ki50bS3blc]]
[[=]]
**[[*user TinSoldier1511]] author of [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-es-035 SCP-ES-035]:**
//Directriz de Guardián// - An high 12m automatan Knight...
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-ES-141" hide="-An own life film"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dhhzs1l-63761e22-4566-4d1f-a5d2-56938d825d32.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_es_141_imitacion_de_la_vida_by_libios_dhhzs1l-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zCquT-tdjBQwv_ZnIHKgNmJjbb4ipQUlt3o6rqa4RDo]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Pachayachachic]] autor de [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-es-141 SCP-ES-141]:**
//Imitación de la vida//.
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-ES-161" hide="- I'm the Lord of the Fauna. Welcome to the Last Forest."]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/di0hhin-ca37f552-8c40-4b2f-9723-52af82292102.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_es_161_el_parque_borges_by_libios_di0hhin-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..0CbgsLHF79K3_HKSsdZ5i9tlnWLbCWO1-rr2I841CNM]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Doctor Von Braun]] author of [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-es-161 SCP-ES-161]:**
//El Parque Borges// - The final phrase was gold.
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-ES-113" hide="- A lovely face, right?"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/di14hjj-af8ba6cb-7629-43f3-ba5c-711e3c3a53f9.jpg/v1/fill/w_894,h_894,q_70,strp/artwork_of_scp_es_113_trato_especial_by_libios_di14hjj-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..L0Z7UxjIwxObxgmXAfdVcXvZNLBrFKRH1KNiOj70WDE]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Dc_Yerko]] author of [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-es-113 SCP-ES-113]:**
//Trato Especial//
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]
------

++ Departments Artworks
[[collapsible show="+ Department of Presumptive Divination" hide="- Personally, I love this department, maybe in the future I could make more bloody fanart of this!"]]
[[=image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/3f34a95b-bb3e-4933-ba80-dfb4d6171d8a/dgy0qop-b4e52114-889a-448d-beeb-acced50f9157.jpg/v1/fill/w_1178,h_678,q_70,strp/fanart_of_occult_orientation__dept__of_presumptive_by_libios_dgy0qop-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..U3612aBl6bgCTWixVVK9q1dl8PbhydrGCTlsTRrEm7g]]
[[=]]
**[[*user Dododevil]] author of the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/presumptive-divination-orientation Department of Presumptive Divination]**
//The phrase that I take its came directly to that page, so that give more credits to [[*user Dododevil]]!//
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]
------
For now, //enjoy!//
